name: SCP: Slaughterbase
description:
The Contact to Facility B1-C has been lost.
There is noone responding to emergency calls from outside.

You play as a Class D Personel who's only goal is to survive and escape the Facility.

This is a Doom inspired Shooter and there are no HUD Elements so play with caution.
Game made with Easy FPS Editor.

Press [E] to use Doors.

Run over  Items to collect them.

Note:

THE GAME IS NOT FINISHED AND WILL RECEIVE MORE LEVELS AND CONTENT IN THE FUTURE.
